name: 322. Lost in My Emotions
description: Sometimes, I get lost in my emotions, overwhelmed by everything I'm carrying inside. It's not easy to be different in a world that doesn't always understand, and the weight of it can feel like too much. But even when I'm lost, I know I'll find my way back because these emotions are part of me, part of what makes me real.

attributes.value: pink, purple, turquoise, orange, dark blue
